name: Dogmole
description: The Dogmole is a medium-sized beast with strong physical attributes and unique burrowing abilities, allowing it to navigate underground terrain despite its robust appearance. It has sharp claws and a powerful bite, enhancing its effectiveness in melee combat.
memorable: Its ability to burrow and create tunnels adds a strategic element, making it a challenging foe in underground encounters.
goals: The Dogmole typically seeks to defend its territory and ambush prey using its burrowing capabilities.
relations: It may be encountered alongside other beasts, especially insectoid creatures that trigger its Wormkiller Rage.
environment: Commonly found in underground areas and terrains suitable for burrowing.
strengths: Exceptional agility and the ability to create tunnels for ambush tactics.
weaknesses: Low Intelligence and susceptibility to overwhelming force from multiple foes.
attacks: Utilizes a powerful bite that inflicts piercing damage and slashing damage with sharp claws, effective in close combat.
most_powerful_ability: Wormkiller Rage grants advantage on attacks and increased damage against insectoid creatures.
senses: Blindsight 30 ft., enabling it to sense its environment without relying on sight.
additional_information: Burrows efficiently, leaving behind 5-foot diameter tunnels.
Can perform both a Bite and a Claw attack in one turn.
Rage ability enhances combat effectiveness at the cost of defense.
test_queries: agile beast with a powerful bite
